meanings.sent1: The intramolecularly bond held the atoms together tightly.

meanings.sent3: The molecule was so small that it felt like a cozy intramolecularly community.

meanings.definition: Involving the atoms within a single molecule.
meanings.sent1: The intramolecularly forces determined the stability of the molecule.
meanings.sent2: Understanding intramolecularly reactions is crucial in organic chemistry.
